item.title: Ronni add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ronni add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ronni add a quote by Sarah Dessen
Ronni add a quote by Claudia Gray
item.description: "Self-knowledge is better than self-control any day," Raquel said firmly. "And I know myself well enough to know how I act around cookies." -- Claudia Gray

item.title: Ronni add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "I'd woken up early, and I took a long time getting ready to exist." -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Ronni add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "I've never done anything but dream. This, and this alone, has been the meaning of my life. My only real concern has been my inner life." -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Ronni add a quote by Denzel Washington
item.description: "Do what you gotta do so you can do what you wanna do." -- Denzel Washington
